display.title: Interdimensional Su
description: A battery block that stores energy and charges items, while wireless transferring energy to other IDSUs.
Acts similar to an Ender Chest but for energy instead of items; all IDSUs share the same energy storage.
Works across distances (e.g. Overworld→Overworld) and dimensions (e.g. Overworld→Nether).

subtitle.text: A battery block that stores energy and charges items, while wireless transferring energy to other IDSUs.
